messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] flying to SC
messages.msgSnippet: ... you re ... Thanks, Marji! Yeah, long trip, tell me about it. I actually considered making this a road trip - I mapped it out on mapquest. The drive is 28
messages.messageBody:
> All right!! I wasn't sure if you'd make the long trip again! I wish I
> could tell you about cheap flights, but I'm really glad to hear that
you're
> coming!!
>
> See you then!
>
> Marji


Thanks, Marji!
Yeah, long trip, tell me about it.
I actually considered making this a road trip - I mapped it out on mapquest.
The drive is 28 hours long!
Dh didn't like that idea. I wasn't crazy about it either.
So, we're flying. My husband and boys are also making the trip.
We're looking forward to it.
I'm glad you'll be there, too. Maybe you can wow everyone again with another
guitar performance. :-)
See you then!

Karin - being real positive about going in spite of not having tickets in
hand, yet! <g>

Karin
